catalog.name: Agricultural Datasets
catalog.description:
Agricultural datasets encompass vital information on farm machinery, infrastructure, farm-to-market roads, and cold storage facilities, etc. . These datasets support decision-making to improve agricultural efficiency, logistics, and resource management, fostering sustainable development in the sector

For inquiries and comments on the Agricultural Datasets, you may contact mis_support@bafe.da.gov.ph.

members.name: Farm to Market Road
members.description:
Farm-to-market road are roads linking the agriculture and fisheries production sites, coastal landing points and post-harvest facilities to the market and arterial roads and highways.

Specifically, these FMRs are local roads such as (provincial, city, municipal, and barangay roads) including farm roads. The quality and quantity of these FMRs have a big impact on transport costs for farmers; good roads close to farms lower production costs and raise the prices that farmers get for their products.

For inquiries and comments on the Farm to Market Road, you may contact seppd.fmrdp@bafe.da.gov.ph.

Network of Protected Areas for Agriculture and Agro-Industrial Development (NPAAAD)
members.description:
Mapping SymbolDescriptionColor Codes (RGB)
AAll irrigated land/areas111-180-102
BAll irrigable lands already covered by irrigation projects w/ firm funding commitments188-224-132
CAll alluvial plain lands highly suitable for agriculture whether irrigated or not255-251-113
DAgro-Industrial crop-lands or lands presently planted to industrial crops that support the viability of existing agricultural infrastructure and agro-based enterprises255-178-211
EHighlands or areas located at an elevation of five hundred (500) meters or above and have the potentials for growing semi-temperate and high-value crops192-174-138
FAll agricultural lands that are ecologically fragile, the conversion of which will result in serious environmental degradation, and mangrove areas and fish sanctuaries255-192-102
GAll fishery areas as defined pursuant to Fisheries code of 1998102-132-252
HForest/Watershed areas (critical watersheds including mangroves)204-204-204
BuBuilt-up areas, urban land, airport, roads and bridges204-204-204
OthersQuarry, mine pit, barren land, rock land, river wash, beach sand, sand dunes and landfill
